Sentencas: This work aims to study on the performance of the SDC-based SOFC with a direct internal reforming of methane at lower temperature in the range of 600-750 degrees C.
Titulo: Performance analysis of direct steam reforming of methane in SOFC with SDC-based electrolyte

Sentencas: The model of SDC-based SOFC with direct internal reforming mode is simulated and validated.
Titulo: Performance analysis of direct steam reforming of methane in SOFC with SDC-based electrolyte

Sentencas: The predicted results are in a good agreement with experimental data.
Titulo: Performance analysis of direct steam reforming of methane in SOFC with SDC-based electrolyte

Sentencas: The simulated results indicate that the molar flow rate of the hydrogen produced from the methane steam reforming reaction is higher as an increasing temperature.
Titulo: Performance analysis of direct steam reforming of methane in SOFC with SDC-based electrolyte

Sentencas: Moreover, the cathode activation overpotential is obviously reduced.
Titulo: Performance analysis of direct steam reforming of methane in SOFC with SDC-based electrolyte

Sentencas: Thus, the increase of temperature from 600 to 700 degrees C can enhance the average power density of SOFC from 0.19 to 0.42 A/m(2).
Titulo: Performance analysis of direct steam reforming of methane in SOFC with SDC-based electrolyte
